name: Microcolonies
description:
You are a cell colony in a dangerous world full of other colonies which want to kill you.

Find more cells, which help you survive and destroy other colonies.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 in one week.

Almost all assets are made by me, but I downloaded music and cell dead sound.

music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Daniel_Birch/indigo/daniel-birch-indigo-strok...

cell dead sound: https://freesound.org/people/DuffyBro/sounds/319107/
